name: Exploding Sheeps GMTK2021
description:
DESCRIPTION

Play as a sheepdog and herd sheep into the correct barns.

Combine different elements to make new sheep, but don't make them explode with the wrong combinations.

WARNING: The game can get pretty loud, so turning down the volume is recommended.

CONTROLS
  • WASD/arrows - move
  • Esc - restart level
  • F1 - skip level
CREDITS
  • Design: Johan Veen & Ruben Ypey
  • Art: Arjen Wester & Esmay Liebke
  • Code: Vincent Versnel & Jan Potma
